about_the_game:
This Supporter Pack is for everyone who wants to spend some extra coin to support the ongoing development of Halls of Torment. In exchange, you will get some fresh visual goodies and a new training area to specifically experiment with loadouts and setups.

 By purchasing this Supporter Pack you receive:

Supporter Skins:

Each character gets one new skin. All changes are cosmetic, abilities and stats are the same as the base characters.

HUD Styles:

Pick from a selection of 3 new UI designs while slaying through a hall.

Training Grounds:

In the Training Grounds there are two rooms available. One simulating a horde.  The other represents just a single enemy to fight. With the new DPS tracker (available in the newest free update!) you can track your damage live and adjust your setup with the tools found in the training grounds.

Our Eternal Thanks

Purchasing this pack shows your support for the game and the developers. For this we a forever thankful!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: 4 Cores / 2.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe / Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD RX 570 (Mesa 22.0)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: 4 Cores / 3.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
